casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Josue RIVERA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 4, 2017

Susan M. Hankins, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 343, 150 A.3d 244 (2016), is denied.

EVELEIGH, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
